members.signatureBeforeChange: public ConstructorDeclaration(ModifierSet mods, String name,                                 List<FormalParameter> params, List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> excepts,                                 ConstructorCall eci, List<Node> stmts,                                 SourceInfo si)
members.signatureAfterChange: public ConstructorDeclaration(ModifierSet mods, Option<List<TypeParameter>> tparams, String name,                                 List<FormalParameter> params, List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> excepts,                                 ConstructorCall eci, List<Node> stmts)
diff: +  public ConstructorDeclaration(ModifierSet mods, Option<List<TypeParameter>> tparams, String name,
+                                List<FormalParameter> params, List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> excepts,
+    this(mods, tparams, name, params, excepts, eci, stmts, SourceInfo.NONE);
-    if (name == null)    throw new IllegalArgumentException("name == null");
-    if (params == null)  throw new IllegalArgumentException("params == null");
-    if (excepts == null) throw new IllegalArgumentException("excepts == null");
-    if (stmts == null)   throw new IllegalArgumentException("stmts == null");

members.signatureBeforeChange: protected TypeDeclaration(ModifierSet mods, String name, List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> impl, List<Node> body,                             SourceInfo si)
members.signatureAfterChange: protected TypeDeclaration(ModifierSet mods, String name, Option<List<TypeParameter>> tparams,                              List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> impl, List<Node> body,                              SourceInfo si)
diff: -  protected TypeDeclaration(ModifierSet mods, String name, List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> impl, List<Node> body,

+                             List<? extends ReferenceTypeName> impl, List<Node> body,
